name: infineon-design-system-stencil
description: Infineon Design System - Web Components built with Stencil
author: Infineon Technologies AG

scripts.build: pnpm run build:components && pnpm run build:wrappers
scripts.build:wrappers: pnpm run -F @infineon/infineon-design-system-angular build && pnpm run -F @infineon/infineon-design-system-react build && pnpm run -F @infineon/infineon-design-system-vue build
scripts.dev:vue: concurrently "pnpm run -F @infineon/infineon-design-system-stencil dev" "pnpm run -F @infineon/infineon-design-system-vue dev" "pnpm run -F vue-example dev"
scripts.dev:react: concurrently "pnpm run -F @infineon/infineon-design-system-stencil dev" "pnpm run -F @infineon/infineon-design-system-react dev" "pnpm run -F react-example dev"
scripts.dev:angular-standalone: concurrently "pnpm run -F @infineon/infineon-design-system-stencil dev" "pnpm run -F @infineon/infineon-design-system-angular dev" "pnpm run -F angular-standalone-example dev"
scripts.dev:angular-module: concurrently "pnpm run -F @infineon/infineon-design-system-stencil dev" "pnpm run -F @infineon/infineon-design-system-angular dev" "pnpm run -F angular-module-example dev"
scripts.dev:html-cdn: concurrently "pnpm run -F @infineon/infineon-design-system-stencil dev" "pnpm run -F html-cdn-example dev"
scripts.dev:html-vite: concurrently "pnpm run -F @infineon/infineon-design-system-stencil dev" "pnpm run -F html-vite-example dev"
